combine_histograms.py - combine several histograms¶

Author:Andreas Heger
Release:$Id$
Date:April 02, 2014
Tags:Python

Purpose¶

OPTIONS: -n, –normalize normalize each histogram -m, –missing= set missing values to # -t, –titles use supplied titles -h, –headers= set header to #, “auto” = filenames -f, –format= format to use when combining histograms –format-value= format for numbers –format-bin= format for bin values

-> relative frequencies -> cumulative counts and frequencies in both directions

Usage¶

Example:

python combine_histograms.py --help

Type:

python combine_histograms.py --help

for command line help.

Command line options¶

combine_histograms.py - combine several histograms
==================================================

:Author: Andreas Heger
:Release: $Id$
:Date: |today|
:Tags: Python

Purpose
-------

OPTIONS:
-n, --normalize         normalize each histogram
-m, --missing=          set missing values to #
-t, --titles            use supplied titles
-h, --headers=          set header to #, "auto" = filenames
-f, --format=           format to use when combining histograms
--format-value=         format for numbers
--format-bin=           format for bin values

-> relative frequencies
-> cumulative counts and frequencies in both directions

Usage
-----

Example::

   python combine_histograms.py --help

Type::

   python combine_histograms.py --help

for command line help.

Command line options
--------------------

option --no-usage not recognized
